prf::ObsHandler

prf::ObsHandler Class Reference

A handler class for Observables. More...

#include <ObsHandler.hh>

Inherits HandlerBase.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The ObsHandler, or observable handler takes care of routine tasks in connection with taking measurements and performing three frequent operations on them.
